title: snowlinux-1-gnome-amd64.iso
description:
Snowlinux is based upon Debian Stable and it aims to make it more user-friendly. This will be reached by own tweaks and tools and by the preinstalled programs. Snowlinux will be released each 6 months. Each version will have a support life cylce for about 18 months.

Forum announcement (3. August 2011, 11:16) : http://www.computerhilfe-forum.com/board101-snowlinux/1515-snowlinux-1-cold-gnome-released/?s=dce9e63a48c75c5b3b97535af7d0339e52d6c270

New features:
Better software selection
New installer
New bootloader
New look and feel
Snowlinux-Metal-Theme
Ubuntu-Font
Bootloader-Theme
Improved speed and response
System improvements

System requirements:
x86-CPU
256 MB memory
2 GB free disk space
